title: T206 cards for sale. 42 cards left. Last chance for these cards
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: T206 cards for sale. 42 cards left. Last chance for these cards
posts.post_content:
I have 42 T206 cards for sale. About half of them are $15 cards, basically any without prices. I cleaned up the scans to make it easier to see what is left. Sold ones will be listed just below. Shipping is $4 for any amount of cards and please use paypal friend/gift.

All are $15 except:
McCormick $20
Willis $20
Wright/red hair $20
Quillen/blue hair $20
Molly Miller SL miscut back $25
Rucker miscut PB back $25
Clark/print line top border $25
Chase/Trophy $25
Lindaman $25
Hulswitt $25 (this card is a Sov back, the label is a dirty liar)
Casey/ double eyes $25 each
McIntyre miscut pied back $30
Charles/Konetchy missing color $30 each
Conroy missing lines in cap $30
Doolan EPDG $30
Chase/White cap $30
Malarkey American Beauty $30

  Just a note: The last picture of nine fronts, goes with the last back photo under it(at least on my screen the last front photo is to the right of the backs from the previous nine cards)


SOLD CARDS: Atz, Bell/wind up, Bliss, Bowerman, Brain, Clymer, Congalton, Demmitt, Jordan, Lake, McGlynn, Merritt, Murray, Pickering, Rhoades, Stahl, Thomas

Bump because I'm going to the Post Office later on, so if I can sell more before noon, great. The sold cards are listed below, still 46 cards left including some double names. Got nine of them in that one pic, seven of them are only $15 each!

SOLD CARDS: Atz, Bell/wind up, Bliss, Bowerman, Brain, Clymer, Demmitt, Jordan, Murray, Pickering, Rhoades, Stahl, Thomas
Thanks! Got for nice upgrades for my collector-grade set at a lot less than I have been seeing them at shows lately.  Easy transaction.

Bump. 46 cards left, prices up top with scans and sold cards listed. 

  The McElveen, White, Stovall and Oakes in the last scan can be had for $10 each. Everything else is $15-$30. Paypal gift/friend please and $4 shipping for any amount of cards.

and they fit right in.
Thanks again.

Doug

I have until Monday at noon to sell these cards, so check the 42 cards above and make an offer. Any reasonable offer will be accepted, especially with a group purchase and as you can see in the first post, the prices were pretty cheap to begin with. Once Monday/noon hits, anything left won't be for sale for awhile so this is the last chance to get any of these cards. I'm willing to listen to offers.  All 42 can be had for $625 dlvd(paypal gift) That is almost $200 off the combined asking price. I'll lower that combined price if individual cards sell.

SOLD CARDS: Atz, Bell/wind up, Bliss, Bowerman, Brain, Clymer, Congalton, Demmitt, Jordan, Lake, McGlynn, Merritt, Murray, Pickering, Rhoades, Stahl, Thomas
See previous response for details. Everything has to be out by noon on Monday(aka tomorrow), so this is the last bump.  42 cards left, lets make a deal!
Hey John, pm coming on the Lake.

I got Mr. Lake in the mail today. Beautiful card, and fast delivery as always. Thank you so much, John. It's a real pleasure doing business with you. Have a safe trip!

Bill
